# idsec_sia_ssh_public_key (Resource)

SIA SSH Public Key resource, manages SIA SSH CA public key installation and removal from a target machine.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `target_machine` (String) Target machine on which to install the ssh public key on
- `username` (String) Username to connect with to the target machine via ssh

### Optional

- `message` (String) Message providing additional information about the operation result
- `password` (String, Sensitive) Password to connect with to the target machine via ssh
- `private_key_contents` (String, Sensitive) Private key contents to use for connecting to the target machine via ssh
- `private_key_path` (String) Private key file path to use for connecting to the target machine via ssh
- `result` (Boolean) Result of the SSH public key operation
- `retry_count` (Number) Number of times to retry to connect if it fails
- `retry_delay` (Number) Delay in seconds between retries
- `shell` (String) Shell to use on the target machine (bash,kornShell)
